title: Trump vs. Musk: A Shocking Showdown That Could Change Democracy!
content:
🚨 Breaking Political News: The feud between Trump and Elon Musk just exploded! 💥 

1/4 Trump accuses Musk of “derangement syndrome” over criticism of the megabill that rolls back EV tax credits, threatening to cut @tesla’s government incentives. 

#election #usa #tech
